p: Generally, virus titers were potently reduced for all treatments and both virus subtypes. Individually applied, 10 µM oseltamivir was required to achieve ≥90% reduction of maximum virus titers produced in control cells, and 1 µM itraconazole was already sufficient to yield a similar reduction ( Figure 6). Combinations of 0.5 µM itraconazole with either 0.1 or 1 µM oseltamivir had an inhibitory effect of ≥90%, which was not seen when the drugs were given individually.
